nodes.text: Ushanna was a female Mirialan mining prospector living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY along with her partner Larvon she ventured to Rishi to search for exonium deposits, using the village of the native Rishii on the Sky Ridge Island as their base camp.
Ushanna appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
